mapper.insert: INSERT INTO carpool_info ( cptype, mno, start_point, start_long, start_lat, end_point, end_long, end_lat, start_datetime, charge, seat_num, seat_opt, drive_opt, trunk_use, smoke_use, req_msg, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{cptype}, #{mno}, #{startPoint}, #{startLong}, #{startLat}, #{endPoint}, #{endLong}, #{endLat}, #{startDateTime}, #{charge}, #{seatNum}, #{seatOpt}, #{driveOpt}, #{trunkUse}, #{smokeUse}, #{reqMsg}, sysdate() )
mapper.select:
SELECT cpno, cptype, start_point, start_long, start_lat, end_point, end_long, end_lat, start_datetime, charge, seat_num, seat_opt, drive_opt, trunk_use, smoke_use, cp.reg_date, cp.mno, mb.userid, mb.name, mb.gender, mb.photo FROM carpool_info cp, member mb WHERE cp.mno = mb.mno
ORDER BY start_datetime DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT cpno, cptype, start_point, start_long, start_lat, end_point, end_long, end_lat, start_datetime, charge, seat_num, seat_opt, drive_opt, trunk_use, smoke_use, cp.reg_date, cp.mno, mb.userid, mb.name, mb.gender, mb.photo FROM carpool_info cp, member mb WHERE cp.mno = mb.mno
ORDER BY start_datetime DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM carpool_info WHERE cpno > 0

SELECT cpno, cptype, start_point, start_long, start_lat, end_point, end_long, end_lat, start_datetime, charge, seat_num, seat_opt, drive_opt, trunk_use, smoke_use, req_msg, cp.reg_date, cp.mno, mb.userid, mb.name, mb.gender, mb.photo FROM carpool_info cp, member mb WHERE cp.mno = mb.mno AND cp.cpno = #{cpno}

SELECT cpno, cptype, start_point, start_long, start_lat, end_point, end_long, end_lat, start_datetime, charge, seat_num, seat_opt, drive_opt, trunk_use, smoke_use, req_msg, cp.reg_date, cp.mno, mb.userid, mb.name, mb.gender, mb.photo, dr.car_no, dr.car_prod, dr.car_model, dr.car_color, dr.car_year, dr.car_photo, dr.post_state FROM carpool_info cp, member mb, driver dr WHERE cp.mno = mb.mno AND cp.mno = dr.mno AND cp.cpno = #{cpno}

SELECT matchno, cpno, match_date AS matchDate, progress, isdriver AS driverChk, cpnum, paysum, mat.mno, mem.userid, mem.name AS username FROM carpool_match mat, member mem WHERE mat.mno = mem.mno AND mat.cpno = #{cpno}

SELECT matchno, mat.mno AS mat_mno, mat.match_date, charge, start_point, end_point, cp.reg_date, payno FROM carpool_info cp RIGHT JOIN carpool_match mat ON cp.cpno = mat.cpno WHERE mat.mno = #{mno} AND mat.progress = 1

SELECT matchno, mat.mno AS mat_mno, match_date, charge, start_point, end_point, reg_date, payno FROM carpool_info cp RIGHT JOIN carpool_match mat ON cp.cpno = mat.cpno WHERE mat.payno = #{payno} AND mat.progress =2 AND mat.mno=#{mno}
mapper.update: UPDATE carpool_match SET progress=#{progress} , payno = #{payno} WHERE matchno=(SELECT matchno FROM (SELECT matchno FROM carpool_match WHERE mno=#{mno}) a)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE MNO = (SELECT MNO FROM CARPOOL_MATCH WHERE carpool_match.isdriver= 1 AND MATCHNO = (SELECT MATCHNO FROM CARPOOL_MATCH WHERE MNO=#{MNO}))
